description: Polymer behavior definition for iron-selectable element, managing item selection, events, and properties.

methods.name: indexOf
methods.description: Returns the index of the given item within the items array.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Sets the selected value, updating the selection state.

methods.name: selectPrevious
methods.description: Selects the previous item in the list, wrapping around.

methods.name: selectNext
methods.description: Selects the next item in the list, wrapping around.

methods.name: _addListener
methods.description: Adds an event listener for the specified event to handle activation.

methods.name: _removeListener
methods.description: Removes the event listener for the specified activation event.

methods.name: _activateEventChanged
methods.description: Updates event listeners when the activateEvent property changes.

methods.name: _updateItems
methods.description: Queries and filters child nodes to update the items list.

methods.name: _updateSelected
methods.description: Updates the selected item based on the current selected value.

methods.name: _selectSelected
methods.description: Selects the item corresponding to the current selected value.

methods.name: _filterItem
methods.description: Filters out nodes with localName in _excludedLocalNames.

methods.name: _valueToItem
methods.description: Converts a value to the corresponding item object.

methods.name: _valueToIndex
methods.description: Converts a value to an index in the items array.

methods.name: _indexToValue
methods.description: Converts an index to its corresponding value.

methods.name: _valueForItem
methods.description: Retrieves the value for an item based on attrForSelected.

methods.name: _applySelection
methods.description: Applies visual and state changes when an item is selected or deselected.

methods.name: _selectionChange
methods.description: Updates the selectedItem property based on current selection.

methods.name: _observeItems
methods.description: Sets up a mutation observer for changes in the items list.

methods.name: _activateHandler
methods.description: Handles activation events from items, activating the corresponding item.

methods.name: _itemActivate
methods.description: Activates an item programmatically, firing 'iron-activate' event.
